Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.rawText.Sentence

  • Packages that use Sentence 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.corpus
    A package dealing with reading annotated corpora.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser) and output artefacts ( ParseConfiguration, ParseTree, and DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.rawText
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators
    Sentence annotators add annotations to the sentence after the raw text has been processed and broken up into individual sentences.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.

      java.util.List<TokenSequence> Tokeniser.tokenise(Sentence sentence, java.lang.String... labels)
      Similar to Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence, String...), but returns the token sequences inferred from the decisions, rather than the list of decisions themselves.

      Similar to Tokeniser.tokenise(Sentence, String...), but returns only the best token sequence.
      java.util.List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence sentence, java.lang.String... labels)
      Similar to Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(String), but the text to be tokenised is contained within a Sentence object.
